title: [K-12] Three-Stage Instructional Design and AI Comparative Modeling for Enhancing Arabic-Korean Translation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced proficiency in Arabic and Korean, and foundational translation theory comprehension
context.additional_context: Necessity to cultivate critical translation skills in response to rapid advancements in AI-based translation technologies

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply a 3-step translation process (analysis-translation-evaluation) to perform accurate Arabic-to-Korean translations that fit the context.
Learners can identify errors in translation outputs by comparing them with ChatGPT and suggest improvement strategies.
Learners can recognize the limitations of AI translation technology and explain strategic approaches human translators use to compensate for them.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
